slip marker on page 4 the charts show right side row and are purl to next marker front slip marker place only for the fronts of the cardigan ie the left front stitches between this marker and next marker onto is between markers 1 and 2 and the right front is waste yarn sleeve remove marker purl to next between markers 5 and 6 marker back slip marker place stitches between row 1 rs sl1p k3 slip marker k3 yo cdd yo this marker and next marker onto waste yarn k3 yo ssk kfb slip marker kfb knit to 1 stitch sleeve remove marker purl to next marker
